query: WITH stats AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id) device_id, endpoint, latest_handshake FROM wireguard_peer_stats WHERE network = $1 ORDER BY device_id, collected_at DESC ) SELECT d.id as "id?", d.name, d.wireguard_pubkey, d.user_id, d.created, d.preshared_key FROM device d JOIN wireguard_network_device wnd ON wnd.device_id = d.id LEFT JOIN stats on d.id = stats.device_id WHERE wnd.wireguard_network_id = $1 AND wnd.is_authorized = true AND (NOW() - stats.latest_handshake) > $2 * interval '1 second'
